Class ResourceDiscovery

java.lang.Object
  Service
      br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.ResourceAgent
          br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.ResourceDiscovery
All Implemented Interfaces:
IResourceAgent, IResourceDiscovery, java.io.Serializable
public class ResourceDiscovery
extends ResourceAgent
implements IResourceDiscovery

Resource Discovery Service class. This class is responsible for search ResourceAgent instances from RespourceRepository
